casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Thomas A. HARRISON, alias George Silverman, alias F. J. Thomas, Defendant-Appellant. No. 118. ^Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 7, 1938. Thomas A. Harrison, pro se. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Frank H. Gordon, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order, 23 F.Supp. 249, affirmed.
